title: Drive Medical Folding Bedside Commode Seat with Commode Bucket and Splash Guard, Powder Blue
features: Easily opens and folds for storage and transportation
Durable plastic snap-on seat and lid installs without pushing buttons
Blue powder-coated steel-welded construction with plastic arms for comfort and support
Comes complete with 7.5 qt commode bucket with carry handle, cover and splash shield
Seat Dimensions: 14.5"(D) x 13"(W) x 15.75-21.5"(H); Outside Legs: 22.25"(W); Width Between Arms: 18"; Weight Capacity: 350 lbs
description: The deluxe folding bedside commode by Drive Medical is designed to meet your needs. The frame can be configured to be used as a bedside commode, toilet safety frame, elevated toilet seat, or put over your existing toilet. The tool free removable back makes configuring the commode easy for any application. The armrests provide a comfortable place to rest on when sitting and indicate a safe place to grab making sitting and standing easier. The push button height adjustable legs makes sizing a breeze allowing this commode to be used as an elevated toilet seat. In addition to comfort this commode can be folded with out tools making storage and travel convenient. The blue power coated steel welded construction ensures strength and durability able to hold up to 350 pounds. The product comes complete with a snap on seat and lid, 7.5-quart commode bucket with cover and convenient carry handle, plus splash guard. Note-users with limited physical strength should be supervised or assisted while using commode. Toilet seat must be in down position before use. Failure to do so may result in breakage of commode and possible injury
